name: UFactory
doc:
Base class for all factories
An object responsible for creating and importing new objects.

SupportedClass: The class manufactured by this factory.
ContextClass: Class of the context object used to help create the object.
Formats: List of formats supported by the factory. Each entry is of the form "ext;Description" where ext is the file extension.
AutomatedImportData: Data for how to import files via the automated command line importing interface
AssetImportTask: Task for importing file via script interfaces
bCreateNew: The default value to return from CanCreateNew()
bEditAfterNew: true if the associated editor should be opened after creating a new object.
bEditorImport: true if the factory imports objects from files.
bText: true if the factory imports objects from text.

methods.name: ScriptFactoryCanImport
methods.doc:
Whether the specified file can be imported by this factory. (Implemented in script)

@return true if the file is supported, false otherwise.

methods.name: ScriptFactoryCreateFile
